briefTitle: Novartis Vaccine and Diagnostics Carriage Trial
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Observer Blind Randomized, Multi-center, Controlled Study to Evaluate the Effect of Novartis Vaccine's Meningococcal B Recombinant and MenACWY Conjugate Vaccines on Pharyngeal Carriage of N. Meningitidis in Young Adults

interventions.name: Meningococcal B Recombinant + Outer Membrane Vesicle vaccine (rMenB+OMV NZ)

summary: The purpose of this trial was to evaluate the effect of Novartis Vaccine's Meningococcal vaccines on carriage of Neisseria meningitidis in a young adult population.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentages of Subjects With Carriage of Virulent Sequence Types (ST) of Neisseria Meningitidis Group B, One Month After Completion of rMenB+OMV NZ Vaccination
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 61 days (31 days after receiving the second injection)
